verses.roman:
romapāda-suto babhrur
babhroḥ kṛtir ajāyata
uśikas tat-sutas tasmāc
cediś caidyādayo nṛpāḥ

synonyms: romapāda-sutaḥ—the son of Romapāda; babhruḥ—Babhru; babhroḥ—from Babhru; kṛtiḥ—Kṛti; ajāyata—was born; uśikaḥ—Uśika; tat-sutaḥ—the son of Kṛti; tasmāt—from him (Uśika); cediḥ—Cedi; caidya—Caidya (Damaghoṣa); ādayaḥ—and others; nṛpāḥ—kings.
translation: The son of Romapāda was Babhru, from whom there came a son named Kṛti. The son of Kṛti was Uśika, and the son of Uśika was Cedi. From Cedi was born the king known as Caidya and others.
